lead_paragraph: What I learned from my experience guiding Nafta through Congress.

headline.print_headline: Free Trade Is Not the Enemy
headline.main: Free Trade Is Not the Enemy

snippet: What I learned from my experience guiding Nafta through Congress.
abstract: Op-Ed article by William M Daley reflects on his role as special counsel in 1993 when Pres Bill Clinton passed North American Free Trade Agreement, in light of debate over Trans-Pacific Partnership; suggests that those opposed to liberalization of American trade policy are wrong, and warns that denying president the authority to negotiate an agreement to present to Congress would be a serious and regrettable rebuke.
